QuestData.Title: Grudge Match
QuestData.Description: I don't know if you've picked up on this, but there's a bit of a rivalry between the ogre members of the Twilight's Hammer and the rest of us.$B$BFor me... it's personal.$B$BThis one ogre called Gromm'ko has a pet raptor named "Butcher." He's taken out the last three of my corehound pups.$B$BI think this last one will fare differently. He's got a real killer's instinct.$B$BGo to the Seat of the Chosen and challenge Gromm'ko to a match between our two beasts. Humiliate him for me, $ndamus.
QuestData.LogDescription: Challenge Gromm'ko at the Seat of the Chosen in Hyjal.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is it done, $ndamus? Did our little champ make it out ok?
